item.title: 20220823172201-quicknotes
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again We have calcium in our bones, iron in our veins, carbon in our souls, and nitrogen in our brains.

item.title: Because it’ll never feel this way again
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again $~$ Go outside, take a breath Spin around, and let out a laugh

item.title: I can't think straight
item.description: OR: ive read somewhere and might want to read again Every night I empty my heart, but by morning it’s full again
